secret_rule: Only items that are named after a person or place can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Paris Hilton" and "Washington Apple".

The one example that was not allowed, "United States of America", does not follow this two-word name pattern.

Therefore, my final guess for the rule is:
The items allowed are names that are composed of two distinct words.
Correct! The rule is: Only items that are named after a person or place can be brought to the picnic.
